Welcome to GitMA's documentation!
=================================

GitMA is a Python package to process, analyze and manipulate `CATMA <https://catma.de/>`_ annotations via the `CATMA Git Access <https://catma.de/documentation/git-access/>`_.


Table of contents
-----------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   intro
   installation
   gitma
   cite_as
